Title: Plastic Recycling
Advice: Wash and dry containers before placing them in the recycling bin to avoid contamination.

Title: Paper and Cardboard Recycling
Advice: Make sure they are clean and dry before recycling. Do not mix dirty paper with other recyclables.

Title: Glass Recycling
Advice: Separate glass by color (green, amber, clear) and do not include broken window or mirror glass, as they have different compositions.

Title: Aluminum Recycling
Advice: Crush aluminum cans to save space and place them in the appropriate container.

Title: Electronics Recycling
Advice: Take electronic devices to specialized e-waste recycling centers.

Title: Battery Recycling
Advice: Drop them off at specific recycling centers, as they contain toxic materials that pollute soil and water.

Title: Textile Recycling
Advice: Donate clothing in good condition or reuse it for crafts or cleaning rags before discarding.

Title: Furniture Recycling
Advice: If in good condition, you can restore, sell, or donate them to charitable organizations.

Title: Cooking Oil Recycling
Advice: Do not pour it down the drain. Store it in a container and take it to collection points for biodiesel recycling.

Title: Organic Waste Recycling
Advice: Compost food scraps and dry leaves to create natural fertilizer for plants.
